title: Covid-19: Centre to resume full office attendance ‘without any exemption’ from Feb 7 - Hindustan Times
content: Covid-19: Centre to resume full office attendance ‘without any exemption’ from Feb 7  Hindustan TimesView Full coverage on Google News
description: The Union ministry of personnel, public grievances & pensions said that Union minister Jitendra Singh held a review meeting on Sunday following which the decision to resume 100% attendance for its employees was taken.
